However, the crux of the matter is that many Ulama from around the world have spoken out vigorously against him and the attitude adopted by him in his writings. Whilst there may be many benefits in his works, there are a lot of grave ?mistakes? therein as well. And one may argue that the benefit be taken and the mistakes be excluded.
